languages.text: "Такая откровенность достойна награды. Дарую тебе клетку в моих покоях — будешь моим личным мясом для пыток".
"Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."
languages.original_text: "Такая откровенность достойна награды. Дарую тебе клетку в моих покоях — будешь моим личным мясом для пыток".

traits.locale_text: "Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."
"Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."
"Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I shall give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."

"Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."

languages.text: "Eine solche Ehrlichkeit muss belohnt werden. Ich gebe Euch einen Käfig in meinen Gemächern ... Ihr seid nun mein persönliches Stück Fleisch und Eure Folter hat gerade erst begonnen."
languages.original_text: "Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."

traits.locale_text: "Eine solche Ehrlichkeit muss belohnt werden. Ich gebe Euch einen Käfig in meinen Gemächern ... Ihr seid nun mein persönliches Stück Fleisch und Eure Folter hat gerade erst begonnen."

languages.text: « Une telle franchise mérite d'être récompensée. Je vous offre donc une cage dans mes propres quartiers. Ainsi, vous serez désormais mon morceau de viande personnel, et croyez-moi si je vous dis que votre tourment ne fait que commencer. »
languages.original_text: "Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."

traits.locale_text: « Une telle franchise mérite d'être récompensée. Je vous offre donc une cage dans mes propres quartiers. Ainsi, vous serez désormais mon morceau de viande personnel, et croyez-moi si je vous dis que votre tourment ne fait que commencer. »

languages.text: «Semejante sinceridad merece una recompensa. Tendrás una jaula en mis aposentos. Ahora eres un trozo de carne y tu tortura no ha hecho más que empezar».
languages.original_text: "Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."

traits.locale_text: «Semejante sinceridad merece una recompensa. Tendrás una jaula en mis aposentos. Ahora eres un trozo de carne y tu tortura no ha hecho más que empezar».

languages.text: 「そのような率直な態度は褒美に値する。私の部屋に檻を与えてやろう。今やお前は私だけの肉の塊だ。この拷問は始まったばかりだ」
languages.original_text: "Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."

traits.locale_text: 「そのような率直な態度は褒美に値する。私の部屋に檻を与えてやろう。今やお前は私だけの肉の塊だ。この拷問は始まったばかりだ」

languages.text: “你的坦率值得嘉奖。我准备给你找个笼子，把你关在我的房间里。你现在是我的私人活畜了，你的折磨这才刚刚开始呢。”
languages.original_text: "Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."

traits.locale_text: “你的坦率值得嘉奖。我准备给你找个笼子，把你关在我的房间里。你现在是我的私人活畜了，你的折磨这才刚刚开始呢。”

languages.text: "Böylesine bir dürüstlük, ödülü hak ediyor. Sana odamda bir kafes ayarlayacağım. Bundan böyle şahsi et tuvalimsin. İşkencense daha yeni başlıyor."
languages.original_text: "Such forthrightness deserves a reward. I give you a cage in my own quarters — you are now my personal slab of meat, and your torture has only just begun."
